description: This task involves updating the Mifos Initiative Wikipedia page In English. There have been lots of changes in Mifos Initiative since the end of 2016 as regards the management and upcoming projects. Make sure to consult with Mifos staff when working on this task. Share the document you've written with the task mentor. Also, append your name to the submitted doc in https://goo.gl/vJjxaP so that we know who did the work.
name: Update The Mifos Initiative Wikipedia Page
